text: @DrTedros @ameenex @MekkiAbdellatif @PattyHajdu @AToros_Official @WHO @DrTedros and @WHO is the laughing stock all over the world by not inviting Taiwan (the best country in handling this coronavirus pandemic) to share their expertise and experience.  Even John Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health has to invite Taiwan to share their expertise.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
